item.title: About
item.description: This line html and shouldn't render with the current config Hello, my name is Andre I’m a consultant software engineer, and I have helped many clients all over the world to build their ETL/ELT pipelines, data warehouses, systems intregrations, automation tools, among other things. My primary interests are data engineering, data science, cloud, devops and backend development. Outside of work I like going to the gym and drinking spiced chai.
